Data Retrieval Scope * `XCREW.CRM_PREF_STATUS.TIME_STAMP` > Last Data Retrieval Date #### - Source Query * `Riverx_CrewBid_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps * Every 1 minutes #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `xcrew.CRM_PREFERENCE.UNO` * Delete operation can not be performed because of the lack of status in the source system data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |crewId|`xcrew.CRM_PREFERENCE`|`TLC`| | |endDate|`xcrew.CRM_PREF_STATUS`|`PREFERRED_END_DATE`| | |period| | |N/A in the source system.| |points| | |N/A in the source system.| |priority|`xcrew.CRM_PREF_STATUS`|`PRIORITY`| | |startDate|`xcrew.CRM_PREF_STATUS`|`PREFERRED_BEGIN_DATE`| | |subtype| | |N/A in the source system.| |type| | |N/A in the source system.| |value|`xcrew.CRM_PREF_STATUS`|`ABSENCE_CODES`| | # Crew Employment Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * All data #### - Source Query * `Riverx_CrewEmployment_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps * Every day at 03:00 (UTC) #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `crewId` * Delete operation can not be performed because of the lack of status in the source system data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |carrier| | |The field is set to "SunExpress" in the query.| |company| |
